DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , randomize , control , open-label , parallel-group , 30-day study take place four center China . The primary objective study assess efficacy safety hyaluronic acid vaginal gel treat vaginal dryness . In current study test hypothesis efficacy hyaluronic acid vaginal gel inferior estriol cream , clinically significant difference , treatment vaginal dryness symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficacy Safety Hyaluronic Acid Vaginal Gel Ease Vaginal Dryness
DOC.criteria: 70 year old , naturally surgically postmenopausal 6 month , symptom vaginal dryness due various cause contraindication locally apply estrogen unmarried , pregnant breastfeed woman , patient vaginal infection trichomonas , candida bacterial vaginosis , patient breast cancer , uterine cancer estrogen hormone dependent tumor , genital bleed unknown origin , patient acute hepatopathy , embolic disorder , severe primary disease kidney hematopoietic system recent malignant tumor
